name: AVCaption.TextCombine
desc: The caption’s supported rendering policy options.

items.name: case all
items.desc: An option that combines all of the characters.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An option that doesn’t combine text upright.

items.name: case oneDigit
items.desc: An option that makes one digit upright.

items.name: case twoDigits
items.desc: An option that combines two consecutive digits.

items.name: case threeDigits
items.desc: An option that combines three consecutive digits.

items.name: case fourDigits
items.desc: An option that combines four consecutive digits.
